title: How Safe Is This Product or Practice?
description: Look up a product or practice from this list to find safety information.
cleaned_text: How Safe Is This Product or Practice? Look up a product or practice on this list to find safety information—including side effects and cautions—from NCCIH fact sheets, MedlinePlus, or other Federal agencies. [Find FDA and FTC notices about recalls, tainted products, and other alerts and advisories](/news/alerts)
